name: Idle Airplane
description:
In Idle Airplane, you are the owner of a small airline company. Your goal is to manage your fleet of planes and expand your business to become the biggest airline in the world.

As you play, your planes will automatically generate income, even when you are not playing. Use this income to upgrade your planes and unlock new ones, each with their own unique abilities.

Can you build a global empire and dominate the skies? Play Idle Airplane and find out!
